long_description: Don't let the cold of winter keep you from having fun. Pull on the Swix Icon gloves and get out on the cross-country trails. Gore WINDSTOPPER(R) fabric eliminates windchill, yet it's breathable and quickly dissipates excess moisture to keep you dry and warm. Neoprene flex panels allow good range of movement and give the gloves a sleek fit. PrimaLoft(R) polyester insulation helps keep your hands toasty on cold winter mornings. Synthetic leather palms and fingers resist abrasion and provide good grip for holding onto ski poles. Swix Icon gloves breathe well to prevent overheating.
